Package com.eventApp.ExceptionHandler

package com.eventApp.ExceptionHandler
Exception handling package for custom exceptions in CampusConnect.

This package defines custom exception classes that provide specific error handling for different types of application failures. These exceptions help in better error reporting and system debugging.

<h3>Exception Classes:</h3>
  • ValidationException - Thrown when input validation fails
  • DatabaseExceptionHandler - Handles database-related errors

Custom exceptions provide more meaningful error messages and allow for specific exception handling strategies throughout the application.

Since:
1.0
  • Exceptions
    Class
    Description
    DatabaseExceptionHandler
    Custom exception class for handling database-related errors within the Event App.
    ValidationException
    Custom exception class for handling validation errors within the Event App.
